classification_schema.WISDOM: Hysteresis prevented a loss. Market moved AGAINST suppressed belief.
classification_schema.REGRET: Hysteresis cost alpha. Market moved WITH suppressed belief.
classification_schema.NEUTRAL: Market movement within noise band. No actionable signal.
classification_schema.INSUFFICIENT_MATURITY: Cannot classify. Suppression duration too short or outcome data unavailable.

outcome_rule.definition: Compare suppressed belief regime vs realized regime from sovereign_regime_state_v4 at window end (T+6h).

logic.NEUTRAL: realized_regime unchanged from suppression_start OR confidence_delta < noise_band
logic.INSUFFICIENT_MATURITY: suppression_duration < 2 hours OR no realized_regime available

outcome_rule.rationale: Regime outcome aligns with system architecture. We track regime states, not raw returns. This ensures classification is verifiable against canonical data sources.

noise_band_definition.definition: A regime transition is considered 'signal' only if belief_confidence delta exceeds 10%. Movement below this threshold is classified NEUTRAL.
noise_band_definition.rationale: 10% confidence delta represents meaningful regime conviction change. Below this, fluctuations are indistinguishable from model noise based on historical calibration data.

threshold_justification.provisional_notice: Thresholds are provisional for SHADOW observation and will be recalibrated after 30 days of reconciled outcomes.
threshold_justification.calibration_method: Post-window analysis will compute actual regret/wisdom ratio. If sample size < 20 classifiable events, thresholds remain provisional.

assets_in_scope.selection_rule: All assets with is_suppressed = TRUE in fhq_perception.sovereign_policy_state during measurement window

success_criteria: Deliver suppression regret report at T+6h
All classifications backed by replayable evidence
Each classification linked to source belief_id and policy_id

freedom_equation_impact.if_regret_dominant: Hysteresis too conservative → reduce confirmation threshold → capture more alpha → increase precision
freedom_equation_impact.if_wisdom_dominant: Hysteresis protective → maintain current thresholds → trust the wait → preserve precision
freedom_equation_impact.time_to_autonomy: This measurement directly informs whether confirmation count (currently 5) should be adjusted
